modName: Iron Man Marvels Avengers Mod UNOFFICIAL
summary: Play as Iron Man and take down Dr.Doom!!
descriptionHtml:
THIS MOD REQUIERES: SKSE, FLYING RING and Fores New Idles, IT WONT WORK WITHOUT THEM!!

SKSE...    http://skse.silverlock.org/

Fores New Idels...     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811

Flying ring....     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15775/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D15775&pUp=1


P.S. The Battle Before You Fight Alduin Has Everyone Iv'e Added To The Game At Once!! Epic!!

In this mod you will play as Tony Stark/Iron Man. You will find 15 different Iron Man suits as well as The Avengers throughout your quest to aid you. You will get one book to summon Rhodey/War Machine that can be used as often as you'd like. As for the other Avenger books, Unibeam and Stun-ulator they can only be used once a day. I recommend restarting and doing a full main quest run, but that's up to you. 

                                             !!!!READ ME BEFORE PLAYING!!!
Things to remember: 

When you start the game choose Tony Stark Race!

Flight mode will make it so you can go through walls, I just use it to escape battles I'm losing, fight dragons, travel far distances and look like a bad ass! When you turn flight mode on your hand spells wont work, only shouts will. After shutting off flight mode you will need to re equip your spell or weapon of choice. If you sheath your weapons before turning flight mode on, when you land you should be able to use the attack button once to equip them.

I always use " setgs fJumpHeightMin 450 " this will make it easier to maneuver through battle. If you jump and stay still only looking around to fire you will stay in the air for a bit like hovering. If you are using it to get up somewhere you can sprint while in air to move faster.

In Riverwood across from The Sleeping Giant Inn you will find a trap door and some chests. Check it out.

All bad guys in open world are set to re-spawn in an hour game time. 
Some bad guys are going to be stronger than you so sometimes you may need to just run away.
Good luck!
________________________________________________________________________________________________________
